home.welcome_subtitle: Monitor and manage your energy consumption efficiently.
home.performance_subtitle: Average readings from your connected devices.
home.energy_saving_subtitle: Learn how to save energy and reduce your electricity bill.
home.tip_1_text: Turn off lights when you leave a room or when there is enough natural light.
home.tip_2_text: Unplug electronic devices when not in use to avoid 'vampire' consumption.
home.tip_3_text: Adjust your thermostat to a comfortable but efficient temperature.
home.tip_4_text: Replace incandescent bulbs with LED bulbs, which consume less energy and last longer.
home.tip_5_text: Take advantage of natural ventilation to cool your home instead of relying solely on air conditioning.
home.tip_6_text: Ensure your appliances are in good condition and receive regular maintenance to optimize their consumption.
home.tip_7_text: Wash with cold water and full loads to maximize efficiency.
home.tip_8_text: Improve your home's insulation to avoid heat loss in winter and heat gain in summer.

devices.title: Devices
devices.voltage_required: Voltage is required and must be a number.
devices.current_required: Current is required and must be a number.
devices.power_required: Power is required and must be a number.

plans.title: Our Plans
plans.select_plan: Choose the best plan for your needs.

guides.title: Connection Guides
guides.subtitle: Follow these steps to connect your EcoVolt devices.
guides.step_1_text: Make sure your EcoVolt device is charged and within range of your Wi-Fi network.
guides.step_2_text: Download the EcoVolt app from the App Store or Google Play Store and create an account.
guides.step_3_text: In the app, select 'Add Device' and follow the on-screen instructions.
guides.step_4_text: Enter your Wi-Fi credentials in the app to connect your device to the internet.
guides.step_5_text: Once connected, you can start monitoring your energy consumption and receiving smart tips.
